citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on 6 DEC
2022. The licensee was on site but needed to leave soon and would not have time to complete an inspection; no other
adult was available.
End Section
